article.p: first-base: ${sblg-first-base} (tags.in) first-stripbase: ${sblg-first-stripbase} (tags.in) first-striplangbase: ${sblg-first-striplangbase} (tags.in) last-base: ${sblg-last-base} (tags.in) last-stripbase: ${sblg-last-stripbase} (tags.in) last-striplangbase: ${sblg-last-striplangbase} (tags.in) count: ${sblg-count} (1) setcount: ${sblg-setcount} (1) abspos: ${sblg-abspos} (1) abscount: ${sblg-abscount} (1) pos: ${sblg-pos} (1) pos-frac: ${sblg-pos-frac} (1) pos-pct: ${sblg-pos-pct} (100) next-base: ${sblg-next-base} (tags.in) next-stripbase: ${sblg-next-stripbase} (tags.in) nest-striplangbase: ${sblg-next-striplangbase} (tags.in) prev-base: ${sblg-prev-base} (tags.in) prev-stripbase: ${sblg-prev-stripbase} (tags.in) prev-striplangbase: ${sblg-prev-striplangbase} (tags.in) source: ${sblg-source} (tags.in.xml) url: ${sblg-url} (should be empty)
